text: 7. The method according to claim 5, wherein the concentration of the aqueous ammonia is 10 to 13mol/l, and the concentration of the ammonia in the bottom liquid of the reaction vessel in the step (2) is 12 to 14 g/l; in the step (4), the ammonia concentration in the reaction system is controlled to be 12-14g/l in the whole stirring reaction process.
